channel.title: Comments on: It's that time of year

item.title: By: Ben Poole
item.dc:creator: Ben Poole
item.description: <p>Alas, I have no idea! Would love to go.</p>
item.content:encoded: Alas, I have no idea! Would love to go.

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>I was searching from Friday thru to Saturday so I guess it's just the dates and I was searching using the conference site not direct with the hotel.</p><p>Of course I'm going, this'll be year number 8 I think. I've even put in a couple of abstracts to see if I can get to speak this year. How about you?</p>
item.content:encoded:
I was searching from Friday thru to Saturday so I guess it’s just the dates and I was searching using the conference site not direct with the hotel.

Of course I’m going, this’ll be year number 8 I think. I’ve even put in a couple of abstracts to see if I can get to speak this year. How about you?

item.title: By: Ben Poole
item.dc:creator: Ben Poole
item.description: <p>Hmm. I just did a search on Saturday thru Friday, one room, and everything came up as available still. Hey ho.</p><p>So, question is: are you going Mr. White??</p>
item.content:encoded:
Hmm. I just did a search on Saturday thru Friday, one room, and everything came up as available still. Hey ho.

So, question is: are you going Mr. White??
